alert.note: Alert for Lemhi (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 07 at 5:21PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Idaho, including the following county, Lemhi. This includes the following Specific Areas... Hwy 93 4th of July Creek to Tower Creek and Salmon River Road between North Fork and Shoup. * WHEN...Until 715 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 521 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - This includes the following Specific Areas... Hwy 93 4th of July Creek to Tower Creek and Salmon River Road between North Fork and Shoup. - https://www.weather.gov/mso/hydrology
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
